ol.title: To view a print preview of a file:

li.p: In the File Management menu group, click File List (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: Click the name of the file you want to view. The Properties window appears.
Under File Properties, in the Actions row, click View. The file contents appear in a separate window.
To print the text, press Ctrl+p. The Print window appears.
Click Print. The file text prints.
